info.title: OpenAPI Plant Store
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

get.description: Returns all plants from the system that the user has access to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return

post.description: Creates a new plant in the store

requestBody.description: Plant to add to the store

delete.description: Deletes a single plant based on the ID supplied

post.description: Create a reserved virtual bank account for a customer. Each reserved account is unique per customer, supports static and dynamic modes, and triggers notifications when funded. Use static accounts for recurring funding and dynamic accounts for one-time payments.

parameters.name: api-secret
parameters.description: Bearer token with your Payvessel secret

bankcode: At least one partner bank code is required
bvn: BVN is mandatory for STATIC accounts

value.message: Unauthorized. Please check your API key.

parameters.name: api-secret

200.description: Return a 200 status to indicate that the data was received successfully

name.description: Customer full name (first name and last name)

phoneNumber.description: Customer phone number in international format

bankcode.description: List of partner bank codes to provision the virtual account with

account_type.description: Type of virtual account to create

businessid.description: Merchant business ID supplied by Payvessel

bvn.description: Customer Bank Verification Number (required for STATIC accounts)

nin.description: Customer National Identification Number (use when BVN is unavailable)

accountNumber.description: Account number assigned to the customer

trackingReference.description: Reference used to track transactions on this account

errors.description: Validation errors keyed by field name

bankCode.description: Partner bank code associated with the account

accountName.description: Account name assigned to the customer

expire_date.description: Expiration date for dynamic accounts; null for static accounts

trackingReference.description: Tracking reference for payments made to this account

cardData.description: Encrypted card data containing payment information

key.description: Encryption key for the card data

redirect_url.description: URL to redirect customer for authentication

gateway_response.description: Additional response data from payment gateway

transactionRef.description: Transaction reference to check status for
Transaction reference to resend OTP for

sub_brand.description: Card sub-brand or specific product type

country_code.description: ISO country code of the issuing country

country_name.description: Full name of the issuing country

amount.description: Transaction amount in kobo (for NGN) or minor currency units

channels.description: Payment channels to enable for this transaction

redirect_url.description: URL to redirect customer after payment completion

reference.description: Unique transaction reference (optional - auto-generated if not provided)
